post:
Hello!

We are LoveVPS we provide loveable VPS solutions for people like you and are proud to extend our range of KVM Virtual Servers to Los Angeles.

We use the following locations:
- Custodian DC (Kent ,UK)
- DimeNoc / HostDime (Orlando, Florida)
- One Willshire (Los Angeles, CA)

All of our UK & LA & Florida services include:
- RAID 10 Storage
- Intel E3-1230 or above CPU
- Free Instant Setup with love!
- Supermicro Servers
- 24x7 Support
- SolusVM
- rDNS Capability

**////////////////////////////////////////////

////////////////////////////////////////////**

Only: $6.99/mo

If you require a quote for any services please drop us an email and we will do our best to help.
